Posts.Content: Jun 8, 2014 05:04PM GorgeousGrandma wrote: Thank you for your concern Redheaded1,  I am being treated I just choose a different path than the one others have made. I have researched and studied and am very confident in my decision. There are many different ways to treat cancer. I appreciate your advise. I am not making my decisions based on fear but from a position of knowing my treatment path. I wanted the surgery as quickly as possible because my first step was getting the tumor out. What I have decided to do after that is just a different path to treating this cancer. Everyone has to do what is right for them and I know I am doing what is right for me. Again thank you my sister
